I’m an xxl, 2x, and 3x depending on the make of the garment, usually ending up in the smaller sizes. I rarely have to size up anymore.  I could get this on but it was tight across my belly and hips. Which was surprising since most items in this size fit me almost perfectly. If you normally size up to have more breathing room, and you usually wear an xxl, this will def be too small. I also wish the liner had slits on the side as well, for ease of moment but it doesn’t. I know the neck is high but it’s just a touch too high for comfort. I am about 15/20lbs too big for this xxl, when I normally don’t have an issue with wearing this size because of how my weight carries. I will be keeping this dress and using it as a before and after in my weight loss journey. It’s pretty and I don’t want to part with it.

评论概述: great cover up or casual vaca outfit
评论详情: The Faoro Sleeveless Long Dress is the perfect blend of style and comfort. This boho halter maxi dress is not only incredibly flattering but also wonderfully comfortable with its loose, flowy fit and high-quality fabric. The casual yet chic design is enhanced by practical features like the side split and pockets, making it both fashionable and functional. It’s an ideal choice for a sundress, cover-up, or any casual outing. The vibrant colors and patterns add a fun, bohemian vibe to my wardrobe, and I've received numerous compliments every time I wear it.

Overall very comfy and got a lot of compliments at last wedding BUT I did have to get from the waist up hemmed. It was boxy and didn't fit right at first. After hemmed it fit nices, fabric was comfy for a summer event and I loved the pockets.
Dress coming apart after first wear. Literally did not wear long are very active in dress. Very disappointed.

This dress looked identical to the pictures! Absolutely loved it, super comfortable, fast shipping and fit like a charm. Would definitely order other colors. It’s a tad low in the chest area but the crochet kinda hides that.

While it was hard to find a bra that worked with this top, everything else seems great.  It flows well, is super comfortable, incredibly light weight, it's dressy or less so and the color is great. I have yet to wash it.
Bought for a summer wedding and could not be happier! This dress is true to size and lightweight, and seems to be good quality. I love that it has an attached under slip which helps it flow nicely.

I bought this for my baby shower and it is extremely comfortable, flattering, and most importantly doesn’t look like you’re wearing a bag. More formed at the top and flows at the bottom, pockets are a huge plus. And low side slits.

When I bought the dress, it fit perfectly! It was flattering and flowy, However, I handwashed it in cold water and gentle soap like most of my sun dresses then hung it to dry. Tried it on for an outing and it had shrunk so tight I had to throw it away. It was the strangest thing! The return window is only 1 month. The dress was great when it first arrived, but I wouldn't spend the money on a one-time wear. not happy
